description: Example spec-manager.json configuration with custom prefix (no tracking system)

_comments.trackingSystem: Set to 'none' when not using GitHub or Jira
_comments.usePrefix: Enables prefix-aware input mode with a custom prefix
_comments.projectPrefix: Your custom prefix - must end with '-' or '_' and be uppercase
_comments.lastUpdated: ISO 8601 timestamp - automatically updated by Kiro

benefits: Type just the number (e.g., '5') instead of the full identifier ('FEAT-5')
Auto-increment will suggest the next number with your custom prefix
No URL reconstruction (since no tracking system is configured)
Both numeric input and full identifiers are accepted
example_workflow: Kiro: 'Identifier (FEAT-): [Press Enter for FEAT-3, or type '4' for FEAT-4]'
Result: Spec created with identifier FEAT-4
prefix_format_rules: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and separators
